query:
INSERT INTO email_templates (name, subject, body, category, isActive) VALUES
('Introduction Email', 'Quick Introduction - Payment Processing Solutions', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I hope this email finds you well. My name is {{agentName}} and I work with businesses like {{companyName}} to optimize their payment processing solutions.

I noticed that you might be interested in reducing transaction fees and improving payment acceptance rates. We''ve helped similar businesses save an average of 30% on processing costs.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call this week to discuss how we could help {{companyName}}?

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'cold_outreach', 1),

('Follow up from Call', 'Great speaking with you - Next Steps', 'Hi {{contactName}},

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me earlier today. I really enjoyed learning more about {{companyName}}''s payment processing needs.

As discussed, I''ll send over the detailed proposal by {{followUpDate}}. In the meantime, if you have any questions or need clarification on anything we covered, please don''t hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to working together!

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'follow_up', 1),

('Application Sent', 'Your Payment Processing Application', 'Hi {{contactName}},

Great news! I''ve submitted your application for {{companyName}}''s payment processing account.

The underwriting team will review your application within 2-3 business days. I''ll keep you updated on the progress and let you know as soon as it''s approved.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about the process, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'nurture', 1),

('Thank you for accepting your application', 'Welcome Aboard - Application Approved!', 'Hi {{contactName}},

Fantastic news! Your payment processing application for {{companyName}} has been approved!

Your account is now active and ready to start processing payments. I''ve attached your welcome pack which includes:

- Account setup instructions
- Integration guides
- Support contact details
- Your dedicated account manager information

I''ll be in touch within the next 24 hours to schedule an onboarding call and ensure everything is set up smoothly.

Welcome to the family!

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'closing', 1),

('Chasing application', 'Quick Check-in - Application Status', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I hope you''re doing well. I wanted to follow up on the payment processing application we submitted for {{companyName}} on {{applicationDate}}.

I haven''t heard back from you and wanted to make sure:

1. You received the application confirmation
2. You don''t have any questions about the process
3. Everything is moving forward as expected

If there''s anything holding things up or if you need any additional information, please let me know. I''m here to help make this as smooth as possible.

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'follow_up', 1),

('OPAYO Email', 'OPAYO Payment Solution - Competitive Rates', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I wanted to reach out regarding OPAYO (formerly Sage Pay) payment processing solutions for {{companyName}}.

OPAYO offers:

✓ Competitive transaction rates starting from 1.2%
✓ Fast settlement (funds in 1-2 business days)
✓ Advanced fraud protection
✓ Easy integration with major e-commerce platforms
✓ Dedicated UK-based support

Based on your current processing volume, I estimate you could save approximately {{estimatedSavings}} per month by switching to OPAYO.

Would you be interested in a quick call to discuss how OPAYO could benefit {{companyName}}?

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'quote', 1),

('Worldpay Email', 'Worldpay Payment Processing - Enterprise Solution', 'Hi {{contactName}},

I''m reaching out to discuss how Worldpay can provide {{companyName}} with a robust, enterprise-grade payment processing solution.

Worldpay advantages:

✓ Global payment acceptance (135+ currencies)
✓ Industry-leading security and compliance
✓ Advanced reporting and analytics
✓ Multi-channel payment acceptance (online, in-store, mobile)
✓ Dedicated relationship manager
✓ Competitive rates for high-volume merchants

For businesses processing over £50,000 monthly, Worldpay offers tailored pricing that typically results in significant savings.

I''d love to schedule a brief call to understand your specific requirements and provide a customized quote.

Best regards,
{{agentName}}', 'quote', 1);
